title: HTPS: Heterogeneous Transferring Prediction System for Healthcare Datasets. (arXiv:2305.01252v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Medical internet of things leads to revolutionary im- provements in medical services, also known as smart healthcare. With the big healthcare data, data mining and machine learning can assist wellness management and intelligent diagnosis, and achieve the P4-medicine. However, healthcare data has high sparsity and heterogeneity. In this paper, we propose a Heterogeneous Transferring Prediction System (HTPS). Feature engineering mechanism transforms the dataset into sparse and dense feature matrices, and autoencoders in the embedding networks not only embed features but also transfer knowledge from heterogeneous datasets. Experimental results show that the proposed HTPS outperforms the benchmark systems on various prediction tasks and datasets, and ablation studies present the effectiveness of each designed mechanism. Experimental results demonstrate the negative impact of heterogeneous data on benchmark systems and the high transferability of the proposed HTPS.

Title: HTPS: Heterogeneous Transferring Prediction System for Healthcare Datasets. (arXiv:2305.01252v1 [cs.LG])
Abstract: Medical internet of things leads to revolutionary im- provements in medical services, also known as smart healthcare. With the big healthcare data, data mining and machine learning can assist wellness management and intelligent diagnosis, and achieve the P4-medicine. However, healthcare data has high sparsity and heterogeneity. In this paper, we propose a Heterogeneous Transferring Prediction System (HTPS). Feature engineering mechanism transforms the dataset into sparse and dense feature matrices, and autoencoders in the embedding networks not only embed features but also transfer knowledge from heterogeneous datasets. Experimental results show that the proposed HTPS outperforms the benchmark systems on various prediction tasks and datasets, and ablation studies present the effectiveness of each designed mechanism. Experimental results demonstrate the negative impact of heterogeneous data on benchmark systems and the high transferability of the proposed HTPS.
translated_title: HTPS: 面向医疗数据集的异构预测系统
translated_abstract: 医疗物联网带来医疗服务的革命性改进，也称为智能医疗。利用大量医疗数据，数据挖掘和机器学习可以协助健康管理和智能诊断，并实现P4医学。然而，医疗数据具有高稀疏性和异质性。在本文中，我们提出了一个异构转移预测系统（HTPS）。特征工程机制将数据集转换为稀疏和密集的特征矩阵，嵌入网络中的自动编码器不仅嵌入特征，还从异构数据集中传输知识。实验结果表明，所提出的HTPS在多种预测任务和数据集上优于基准系统，消融研究表明了每个设计机制的有效性。实验结果展示了异构数据对基准系统的负面影响以及所提出的HTPS的高可转移性。
tldr: 本文提出了面向医疗数据集的异构预测系统HTPS，其通过特征工程和自动编码器实现特征嵌入和异构数据的知识转移。实验结果表明，HTPS在多种预测任务和数据集上的表现优于基准系统。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an Heterogeneous Transferring Prediction System (HTPS) for healthcare datasets, which utilizes feature engineering and autoencoders to embed features and transfer knowledge from heterogeneous datasets. Experimental results show that HTPS outperforms benchmark systems on various prediction tasks and datasets.
